Name: Boerejongens
Review Text: Great shop! One of the best in Amsterdam. The staff is kind, courteous, and knowledgeable. They all speak Dutch and English of course. They have a good selection of both edibles and strains. ‚Ä¶

Name: Boerejongens
Review Text: Their products are TOP ! Nice menu and GREAT hash collection. If you're a hash lover, this is your place! Don't go to the central one because it is always crowded. Take a walk and enjoy the city and visit their less crowded one. You won't regret it.

Name: Boerejongens

Name: Boerejongens
Review Text: Best Coffeeshop in Amsterdam, probably in the whole of Netherlands. Amazing buds on a decent price. Staff is friendly and enjoys serving you. Prices are for everyone - 8 euros if you're a cheapass like me up to 15, 16 for designer buds.

Review Text: This is a professional run shop with tremendous knowledgable and friendly people. The ‚Äústuff‚Äù is of outstanding quality at acceptable prices. And the best? You don‚Äôt have the usual stigma. Shop style is more like a pharmacy with modern interieur. Customer base seem to consist of local people and more mature foreigners. Recommended!

Name: Boerejongens
Review Text: Amazing! A cannabis pharmacy! Clean, spacious, helpful and friendly staff, good prices, a range of different edibles - red velvet cake highly recommended! Not as busy as the shop in the city centre, but still gets crowds. Definitely worth a visit!

Name: Boerejongens
Review Text: As always top quality - but I regret to say it's not the same as it was before corona. So keep it up boys :)

Name: Boerejongens
Review Text: The service was very professional, but a little rushed. The store is a out of town, and frequented mostly by locals. The weed quality and selection is exceptional. And i rank Boerejongens in the much disputed No.1 place to stock up.

Name: Boerejongens
Review Text: Great local spot. Weed is great quality and always a good price. But the best thing is the staff. Always honest and friendly and never any attitude. And that for a coffeeshop in Amsterdam is a rarity. This one is more for locals, but there is one for tourists in the centre.

Name: Boerejongens
Review Text:

Name: Boerejongens
Review Text: Great strains and (usually) very professional staff. Went during my first visit in Amsterdam and had to go back during my second. ‚Ä¶

Name: Boerejongens
Review Text: We visited several coffeeshops while on a recent trip to Amsterdam.  Boerejongens was our favorite.  Some of the best weed we've ever had. Lemon ice!  So sticky hard to roll but so good! We kept going back for more. Wish we could have ‚Ä¶

Review Text: I like this place and I was always pleased with the service that I received. But today something changed. I asked a guy at the desk "could you recommend some strong indica?", but he laughed at me and just pointed me to the menu and started offering something completely irrelevant to my request. It was not nice at all.

Name: Boerejongens
Review Text: Best shop ever!!!! Anywhere, any time, any place best bud best price best shop best everything period.

Name: Boerejongens
Review Text: Fantastic staff, super strains (all from Amsterdam Genetics) with a great attitude. Feels more like a friendly neighborhood pharmacy than a coffeeshop, which I definitely prefer. Best coffeeshop if you are looking for professional service and quality herb.

Name: Boerejongens
Review Text: Early morning 0700 open. Great time when you are an early bird. Only negative, they didn't have what I wanted at first due to the early morning and had not restocked but I ended up having a backup because I did my research before I went!! Great help from the people there as well!

Name: Boerejongens
Review Text: 1st coffeeshop in Amsterdam, big buds for a gram, crunchy and tastefull weed, faboulus Amazing-haze and Pineapple-haze

Name: Boerejongens
Review Text: Great coffeeshop! Professional and friendly staff, with a selection of the best weed and hash sold at affordable prices. The locals' top choice, not a tourist trap. Definitely one of the best coffeeshops around. Always top!

Name: Boerejongens
Review Text: Very pleased with the quality of the cannabis and the helpfulness of the staff. Would absolutely return, it came highly recommended to me and I concur. A true gem of Amsterdam.
